title: Masters - Applications + more
content:
Hi everybody,

I graduated with my Bachelor's degree from PESU (RR) in 2022 (Electrical Engineering), and am finishing my Masters at Arizona State this year. Many people from universities I was applying to helped me with my applications and gave me useful inputs on applications, statements of purpose, etc. I cannot thank them enough, and it is now my turn to start giving back and to me, the best way to do so is to help more students. 

I am planning to schedule about 2 hours every weekend (Saturday Nights IST) to help students with applications, try to answer any questions you might have, and look over SoPs and stuff. I want to do this for free, as I believe that it would be helpful for students who want to pursue a higher education abroad. 

I have experience doing this for many applicants as I had a small business back in the day where we did this professionally. During my master's, I've helped my juniors go through applications as well.

If doing this could be of use to you, please reach out :)

​
